content:
You stop for a moment to rest your tired legs. Feeling the aches in your muscles beginning to fade, you're starting to feel thirsty. Without looking, you reach for the canteen you leave hanging from your pack … only to have it pressed into your hand.

You jump and turn, only to see Kal Iver sitting next to you and barely containing his laughter. “You should see your face!” he cries. “Ah, sorry to startle you,” he continues, wiping tears from his eyes, “but I just couldn’t resist. You’re looking pretty tired—hopefully not too tired to keep up.”

Place 1  per Ranger on Kal Iver.

Clear Kal with   to challenge him to yet another race.
